title: Home free
creator_credit: Fruits and Roots Production, Rebecca Yates and Glen Salzman
brief_description: Reverses the traditional story of the ethnic child assimilated into Western culture by placing a ten-year-old white girl into a new cultural environment - a Chinese neighbourhood. Conveys the mystery, threat and strangeness of the “new” community as experienced by the girl. Suitable for upper primary level.
